snippet: Steven Sotloff, James Foley and other journalists on the front lines make us better informed.
abstract: Nicholas Kristof Op-Ed column pays tribute to Steven Sotloff, second American journalist beheaded by ISIS in Syria, for his efforts to cover real news and push back against trend of trivial news coverage; says Sotloff, executed journalist James Foley and others like them are becoming increasingly rare and necessary in era of news that highlights celebrity, scandal and salaciousness; notes hardships, including kidnapping and murder, that such journalists face.
lead_paragraph: Steven Sotloff, James Foley and other journalists on the front lines make us better informed.
